tasks.label: Launch: Livox (MID360)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch robofi_bringup livox_lidar.launch.py xfer_format:=4
tasks.detail: Runs Livox MID360 driver with xfer_format=4 so both /livox/lidar (PointCloud2) and /livox/lidar_custom (Livox CustomMsg) are published via robofi_bringup

tasks.label: Launch: Livox RViz (MID360)
args: DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e bash -lc "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch livox_ros_driver2 rviz_MID360_launch.py user_config_path:=${workspaceFolder}/src/livox_ros_driver2/config/MID360_config.json"
tasks.detail: Runs Livox driver and RViz in xterm on DISPLAY :3; uses the MID360 config.

tasks.label: Launch: RQT Image View
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority ros2 run rqt_image_view rqt_image_view
tasks.detail: Runs rqt_image_view directly on DISPLAY :3 to visualize camera/image topics

tasks.label: Launch: RealSense D435
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch realsense2_camera rs_launch.py
tasks.detail: Launches Intel RealSense D435 camera driver with default configuration

tasks.label: Launch: FAST_LIO Mapping
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority ros2 launch robofi_bringup fast_lio.launch.py
tasks.detail: Runs FAST_LIO mapping (requires Livox driver to be running separately) on DISPLAY :3

tasks.label: Display: Robot Model with GUI
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority ros2 launch ranger_description display.launch.py gui:=true
tasks.detail: Launches robot model visualization in RViz with Joint State Publisher GUI on DISPLAY :3 to verify meshes and sensor frames

tasks.label: Launch: Ranger Complete Bringup
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority ros2 launch robofi_bringup ranger_complete_bringup.launch.py
tasks.detail: Launches the complete Ranger system: base controller, LiDAR, RealSense camera, robot state publisher, and TF tree on DISPLAY :3

tasks.label: FAST_LIO: Save Map
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 service call /map_save std_srvs/srv/Trigger && echo 'Map saved to fast_lio_map.pcd' && ls -lh ${workspaceFolder}/*.pcd
tasks.detail: Saves the current FAST_LIO map to fast_lio_map.pcd file in the workspace root
